text: (aey nabi ki dono biwiyo!) agar tum dono Allah kay samney tauba kerlo (to boht behtar hai) yaqeenan tumharay dil jhuk paren hain aur agar tum nabi kay khilaf aik doosray ki madad kero gi pus yaqeenan uss ka kaar saaz Allah hai aur jibraeel hain aur nek ehal-e-eman aur inn kay ilawa farishtay bhi madad kerney walay hain
